item.title: Weather comparison
item.description: You know by now, I’m a bit concerned about this weather. While checking the weather forecast, I came up with this idea of comparing the weather between Bangalore and Milwaukee. Just for giggles. The below graphs are drawn with the data available freely on the net(weather.com, wikipedia and wunderground.com). I believe they should be fairly accurate. Bangalore vs Milwaukee - Weather(°F) Bangalore vs Milwaukee - Weather(°C)
